page.title: 02WHERE WE BUY OUR SUPPLIES
page.content: From a census of 30 families in the area we found some interesting trends. Most people buy their{ready made meals locally from a small shop.For{meat most people buy locally .Many people either buy{groceries}from the village or Tavistock in a supermarket.Almost all people buy{dairy products}from the village milkman.For{clothing}people go to Plymouth into large shops.People tend to buy{petrol}locally from a small garage.{Car maintenance parts}on the other hand are bought in Plymouth.For home{D.I.Y.}people go to Plymouth.Most people get their{fuel locally.People usually go into Tavistock for{gifts}but for {entertainment}they travel to Plymouth.
